config_output_path.description: (Default is 'Your home-assistant config directory') Path where to store the config.
config_output_path.name: Config output path

reset_energy_counter.description: Resets the energy counter of a measuring entity.

entity_id.description: The ID of the measuring entity. Use 'all' keyword to reset all energy counters.
entity_id.name: Entity

reset_energy_counter.name: Reset energy counter

set_active_climate_profile.description: Sets the active climate profile index.

climate_profile_index.description: The index of the climate profile.
climate_profile_index.name: Climate profile index

entity_id.description: The ID of the climate entity. Use 'all' keyword to switch the profile for all entities.
entity_id.name: Entity

set_active_climate_profile.name: Set active climate profile
